Interests

You can usually find me outside tending to my garden or observing birds and small animals in my yard. I am lucky to be living next to some conservation land in the Boston area which provides a forest backdrop to my home. This allows me to pursue my interest in nature photography.

Im also into listening to audiobooks and watching TV shows from the sci-fi genre when indoors. Since graduating from the bootcamp, i've also taken to doing coding challenges to improve my software development skills
